duties_responsibilities.duty: Negotiate and develop business with new and current clients through telephone, video, and in-person meetings.
Recruit, interview, and match highly skilled administrative and customer support professionals with clients’ projects and opportunities.
Manage ongoing engagements to deliver outstanding customer service to clients and candidates.
Provide ongoing communication and career guidance to candidates.
Participate in local trade association and networking events to increase company’s presence in the local business community.
